results.title: Scarface
results.plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.
results.stars: Brian De Palma, Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

results.title: The Thing
results.plot: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.
results.stars: John Carpenter, Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David, Richard Masur

results.title: The Goonies
results.plot: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.
results.stars: Richard Donner, Sean Astin, Josh Brolin, Jeff Cohen, Corey Feldman

results.title: Back to the Future
results.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
results.stars: Robert Zemeckis, Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover

results.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
results.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys-Davies

results.title: The Shining
results.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers

results.title: The Princess Bride
results.plot: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
results.stars: Rob Reiner, Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright, Chris Sarandon

results.title: Blade Runner
results.plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
results.stars: Ridley Scott, Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, Edward James Olmos

results.title: Stand by Me
results.plot: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.
results.stars: Rob Reiner, Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman, Jerry O'Connell

results.title: The Terminator
results.plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
results.stars: James Cameron, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn, Paul Winfield

results.title: The Breakfast Club
results.plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.
results.stars: John Hughes, Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Ally Sheedy

results.title: Dead Poets Society
results.plot: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.
results.stars: Peter Weir, Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke, Josh Charles

results.title: Aliens
results.plot: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.
results.stars: James Cameron, Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn, Paul Reiser

results.title: Come and See
results.plot: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.
results.stars: Elem Klimov, Aleksey Kravchenko, Olga Mironova, Liubomiras Laucevicius, Vladas Bagdonas

results.title: Full Metal Jacket
results.plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Matthew Modine, R. Lee Ermey, Vincent D'Onofrio, Adam Baldwin

results.title: Once Upon a Time in America
results.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
results.stars: Sergio Leone, Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Treat Williams

results.title: Airplane!
results.plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.
results.stars: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker, Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Leslie Nielsen, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

results.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
results.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote, Dee Wallace

results.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
results.plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.
results.stars: John Hughes, Matthew Broderick, Alan Ruck, Mia Sara, Jeffrey Jones

results.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
results.plot: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.
results.stars: Irvin Kershner, Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams

results.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
results.plot: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody, Denholm Elliott

results.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
results.plot: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.
results.stars: Richard Marquand, Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams

results.title: The Last Emperor
results.plot: Dramatization of China's last emperor, Puyi.
results.stars: Bernardo Bertolucci, John Lone, Joan Chen, Peter O'Toole, Ruocheng Ying

results.title: Predator
results.plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.
results.stars: John McTiernan, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Kevin Peter Hall, Elpidia Carrillo

results.title: Rain Man
results.plot: After a selfish L.A. yuppie learns his estranged father left a fortune to an autistic-savant brother in Ohio that he didn't know existed, he absconds with his brother and sets out across the country, hoping to gain a larger inheritance.
results.stars: Barry Levinson, Dustin Hoffman, Tom Cruise, Valeria Golino, Gerald R. Molen

results.title: Ghostbusters
results.plot: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.
results.stars: Ivan Reitman, Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis

results.title: Lethal Weapon
results.plot: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.
results.stars: Richard Donner, Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan

results.title: Die Hard
results.plot: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
results.stars: John McTiernan, Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson

results.title: Amadeus
results.plot: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.
results.stars: Milos Forman, F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge, Roy Dotrice

results.title: Blue Velvet
results.plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.
results.stars: David Lynch, Isabella Rossellini, Kyle MacLachlan, Dennis Hopper, Laura Dern

results.title: The Elephant Man
results.plot: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.
results.stars: David Lynch, Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt, Anne Bancroft, John Gielgud

results.title: Platoon
results.plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.
results.stars: Oliver Stone, Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe, Keith David

results.title: Evil Dead II
results.plot: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.
results.stars: Sam Raimi, Bruce Campbell, Sarah Berry, Dan Hicks, Kassie Wesley DePaiva

results.title: Grave of the Fireflies
results.plot: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.
results.stars: Isao Takahata, Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Akemi Yamaguchi, Yoshiko Shinohara

results.title: The Untouchables
results.plot: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.
results.stars: Brian De Palma, Kevin Costner, Sean Connery, Robert De Niro, Charles Martin Smith

results.title: First Blood
results.plot: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.
results.stars: Ted Kotcheff, Sylvester Stallone, Brian Dennehy, Richard Crenna, Bill McKinney

results.title: Raging Bull
results.plot: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.
results.stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci, Frank Vincent

results.title: RoboCop
results.plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
results.stars: Paul Verhoeven, Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Dan O'Herlihy, Ronny Cox

results.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
results.plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.
results.stars: Robert Zemeckis, Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy, Charles Fleischer

results.title: The Blues Brothers
results.plot: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.
results.stars: John Landis, John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Cab Calloway, John Candy

results.title: After Hours
results.plot: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho he met that evening at a coffee shop.
results.stars: Martin Scorsese, Griffin Dunne, Rosanna Arquette, Verna Bloom, Tommy Chong

results.title: My Neighbor Totoro
results.plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.
results.stars: Hayao Miyazaki, Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto, Shigesato Itoi

results.title: The Fly
results.plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.
results.stars: David Cronenberg, Jeff Goldblum, Geena Davis, John Getz, Joy Boushel

results.title: Empire of the Sun
results.plot: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Christian Bale, John Malkovich, Miranda Richardson, Nigel Havers

results.title: Akira
results.plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.
results.stars: Katsuhiro Ôtomo, Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Tesshô Genda

results.title: Back to the Future Part II
results.plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.
results.stars: Robert Zemeckis, Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Tom Wilson

results.title: Do the Right Thing
results.plot: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.
results.stars: Spike Lee, Danny Aiello, Ossie Davis, Ruby Dee, Richard Edson

results.title: Cinema Paradiso
results.plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.
results.stars: Giuseppe Tornatore, Philippe Noiret, Enzo Cannavale, Antonella Attili, Isa Danieli

results.title: The Road Warrior
results.plot: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.
results.stars: George Miller, Mel Gibson, Bruce Spence, Michael Preston, Max Phipps

results.title: Das Boot
results.plot: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.
results.stars: Wolfgang Petersen, Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer, Klaus Wennemann, Hubertus Bengsch
